backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: landing page with business info, call button, WhatsApp booking button, and vibrant playful visual theme with orange accent colors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components for hero banner, business info, character showcase, service highlights, contact buttons, footer, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color tokens including neutral grays, accent colors, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Brother's Live Cartoon', and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component composing header, hero banner, business info, character showcase, service highlights, contact buttons, and footer in a gradient background layout.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfo.tsx: Component displaying business address and phone number in two cards with MapPin and Phone icons from lucide-react.
frontend/src/components/CharacterShowcas: Component displaying six cartoon characters (Gorilla, Red Teddy, Yellow Teddy, Doraemon, Mickey Mouse, Motu-Patlu) in a responsive grid with hover effects and generated images.
frontend/src/components/ContactButtons.t: Component with 'Call Now' button (opens tel: link) and 'Book on WhatsApp' button (opens WhatsApp with prefilled message) for phone number 9427065911.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice and 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Hero banner component displaying generated hero image with gradient overlay and 'Live Cartoon Characters' title with animated sparkle icons.
frontend/src/components/ServiceHighlight: Component displaying event types (Birthday Party, Wedding Entry) and service highlights (High Quality Costumes, Energetic Performers, Reasonable Rates) in two cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook for managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, query caching, and automatic invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend API calls are needed since all functionality is client-side (phone dialer and WhatsApp links).
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, including design tokens for UI components, charts, and sidebar.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a Flutter app for Brother's Live Cartoon character booking service with business info display, call/WhatsApp contact features, and required mascot character images.
